This report aims to provide an in-depth analysis of the Bilderberg Group's

history, structure, and activities, as well as its impact on global politics and

society. By examining the group's membership, agenda, and outcomes, we will

critically evaluate the extent to which the Bilderberg Group influences

decision-making processes at the national and international levels.

Through a comprehensive review of existing literature and primary sources,
